subject: Re: Amazon Order
description_text:
This order from 5 months ago, seems to be defective. The motors to the
simpson plux x motor module seems to have gone bad on two of the 3 modules.
I can swap the remaining motor to any of the three motor controls on
the control box so I don't think it's the control box. Any chance I can get
a discount on two motor modules only. I don't need the full kit.

Nate

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025 at 10:26 AM Nathan Brown <nathanpbrown78@gmail.com>
wrote:

> I have an amazon order:containin haptic pedal motors and a control box. I
> received the haptic pedal motors but no control box. I realize they may
> come separately, the issue is I have no way to track the control box thru
> amazon. Can you guys get back to me with tracking for the control box?
>
> 113-0356996-4793810
>
> [image: image.png]
>

conversations.body_text:
You guys are awesome.

Nathan Brown
6352 Westerly Terrace
Jamesville, NY 13078

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 1:33 AM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Hi Nathan,
> As per your case, Your product is currently within its shelf life, and we
> will resend you two new motors. Could you please provide us with your
